Nummer Dezimal = Binar Laufwerk

1 1 = 00000000000000000000000001 a:\
2 2 = 00000000000000000000000010 B:\
3 4 = 00000000000000000000000100 c:\
4 00000000000000000000000000 D:\
5 00000000000000000000010000 E:\
6 00000000000000000000100000 F:\
7 00000000000000000001000000 G:\
8 00000000000000000010000000 #:\
9 00000000000000000100000000 r:\
10 00000000000000001000000000 3:\
1 00000000000000010000000000 K:\
12 00000000000000100000000000 L:\
13 00000000000001000000000000 m:\

14 00000000000010000000000000 N:\

15 00000000000100000000000000 0:\

16 00000000001000000000000000 P:\

17 65536 = 00000000010000000000000000 Q

18 131072 = 00000000100000000000000000 R:

19 262144 = 00000001000000000000000000 s

20 524288 = 00000010000000000000000000 Tr.

21 1048576 = 00000100000000000000000000 uv

22 2097152 = 00001000000000000000000000 v

23 4194304 = 00010000000000000000000000 w

24 8388608 = 00100000000000000000000000 x

25 16777216 = 01000000000000000000000000 ¥

26 33554432 = 10000000000000000000000000 z

E 67108855 = 11111111111111111111110111 a: - z: ohne D:

£ 67108863 = 11111111111111111111111111 a: - z: Alle
ZYXWVUTSRQPONMLK JIHGFEDCBA
